posts.title: Hilton!
posts.excerpt: Quote:The roughly beautiful Hilton! gives the viewer a glimpse of life in a modern society, a life that young persons lead. posts.title: A Teacher
posts.excerpt: A high school teacher in Austin, Texas has an affair with one of her students. Her life begins to unravel as the relationship comes to an end.

posts.title: The Lucky Dog
posts.excerpt: The Lucky Dog is the first film to include both members of the famous comedy duo of Stan Laurel and Oliver Hardy, later known as Laurel and Hardy and is the first occasion that they worked together. Though they appear in scenes together, they play independent of each other and not as the comedic team …

posts.title: Menya zovut kozha

posts._title: Chris Marker – Dimanche à Pekin AKA Sunday in Peking [ENGLISH] (1956)
posts.title: Dimanche à Pekin
posts.excerpt: Director Chris Marker begins by recounting his childhood dream of visiting the city of Peking – a city he was once only able to admire in books. The viewer is taken on a journey through this city, as if experiencing it from the mind and through the eyes of Marker. His thoughts and observations about …

posts.title: Possession [+Commentary]
posts.excerpt: Summary:A young woman left her family for an unspecified reason. The husband determines to find out the truth and starts following his wife. At first, he suspects that a man is involved. But gradually, he finds out more and more strange behaviors and bizarre incidents that indicate something more than a possessed love affair.

posts._title: Iván Osnovikoff & Bettina Perut – Noticias AKA News [+ Extras] (2009)
posts.title: Noticias
posts.excerpt: Noticias is an observational film that using the fragmented format of a newscast program proposes a cinematic glance to the same reality depicted daily by the media. By means of a radical approach to journalistic and anti-journalistic facts, the film puts into play the ways in which collective truths are made.
